meanings.definition: Beneath the surface of the ground.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit dug a burrow underground to hide from predators.
meanings.sent2: The miners worked underground to extract valuable minerals.
meanings.sent3: The treasure was buried underground, waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the tree spread underground like a hidden network.
meanings.sent5: The subway system runs underground, connecting different parts of the city.

meanings.definition: A movement or group operating secretly or illegally.
meanings.sent1: The rebels formed an underground resistance to fight against the oppressive regime.
meanings.sent2: The spy network operated underground to gather sensitive information.
meanings.sent3: The underground poker club met in a hidden basement to avoid detection.
meanings.sent4: The underground music scene thrived in hidden venues away from mainstream attention.
meanings.sent5: The underground railroad helped slaves escape to freedom in the north.
